ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] eqclient.ini tweaks
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a full screen one that I m VERY happy with but it has some bad areas when in windowed view.  If you want it I ll send it out later. Lyrnia Jongleur
ygData.messageBody:
I have a full screen one that I'm VERY happy with but it has some bad areas
when in "windowed" view. If you want it I'll send it out later.

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath since Beta 2
----- Original Message -----
From: "Daniel Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
To: "EQ Bards" <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 31, 2000 4:52 PM
Subject: [eqbards] eqclient.ini tweaks


>
> I've been tweaking mine and always seem to make it worse. Anyone have one
> out there that they are proud of? BTW - I have an Nvidia card (Geforce2
> GTS) so obviously using D3D. I think this makes a difference since on my
> old box I had a Voodoo3 2000 - and the colors somewhat different
different..
>
> Thanks!
>
> Slyde
